Address.value: 11815 ALTERRA PARKWAY,SUITE 1500, AUSTIN, Texas, 78758, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Citizens Inc is an insurance holding company serving the life insurance needs of individuals in the United States. The company provides insurance benefits to residents in 31 U.S. states and more than 70 countries through its insurance subsidiaries. The company operates in two business segments namely the Life Insurance segment and the Home Service Insurance segment. The company primarily generates revenues from insurance premiums and investment income on invested assets.
